agenda.description: ** REVISION ** HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES NOTICE OF PUBLIC HEARING COMMITTEE: Land & Resource Management TIME & DATE: 8:00 AM, Tuesday, May 7, 2019 PLACE: E2.012 CHAIR: Rep. Tom Craddick SB 422 Campbell | et al. Relating to the authority of a municipality to impose a fine or fee in certain areas in the municipality's extraterritorial jurisdiction. SB 608 Watson | et al. Relating to the continuation and functions of the School Land Board. SB 1303 Bettencourt | et al. Relating to maps of the actual or proposed boundaries and extraterritorial jurisdiction of a municipality and certain notices related to expanding the boundaries. SB 1304 Bettencourt | et al. Relating to notice of proposed changes to municipal zoning classifications. Bills added after last posting: SB 608 ** See Committee Coordinator for previous versions ** of the schedule, if applicable. NOTICE OF ASSISTANCE AT PUBLIC MEETINGS Persons with disabilities who plan to attend this meeting and who may need assistance, such as a sign language interpreter, are requested to contact Stacey Nicchio at (512) 463-0850, 72 hours prior to the meeting so that appropriate arrangements can be made.
